title: Oxford Advanced Learner's Dictionary with AUDIO
description:

use completely OFFLINE....with data base with Audio...


INSTROLLING METHOD 1

connect into a wifi network or turn on your data connection

INSTROLLING METHOD 2 (THE BETTER way...)

1 just download the "OALD.apk" and instroll download offline data base Via your data connection or using wifi
